document.full_text: an amateur has never won the masters. an amateur has not threatened to win the masters since charles coe finished tied for second in 1961. in the last 10 years, only 8 of the 48 amateurs in the field have made the cut.
document.title: amateurs face unkindest cut at augusta
lines_and_colors: an amateur has never won the masters. an amateur has not threatened to win the masters since charles coe finished tied for second in 1961. in the last 10 years, only 8 of the 48 amateurs in the field have made the cut.
